SELECT
BOARD_NO, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME
FROM BOARD b JOIN "MEMBER" m ON (b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE bt ON (b.BOARD_CODE = bt.BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y'
